Name: Stela of Amen-mose
Description: In the lunette of the stela, the mummiform god Osiris is shown on a throne on the left. Behind him stand - in pairs - Isis and Nephthys and Horus and Wepwawet. To the right, two men and a woman are standing giving adoration. In front of Osiris is an offering table with loaves, cuts of meat, fruit and flowers.The middle register depicts Osiris sitting on a throne on the left. In front of him are three men and three women in a posture of adoration. The lower register is very similar. Four people are adoring Osiris. On the right and facing right is a kneeling man, with a tree goddess pouring water on his hands. The lowermost part is a single row of text.
